summary: Encapsulates the definition and processing of horizontal flow barriers for a MODFLOW‑6 groundwater model, converting a GeoDataFrame of line geometries, hydraulic characteristics and layer indices into the HFB package input for a single model layer.
business_intent: Provide groundwater modelers a streamlined way to add and configure horizontal flow barriers with hydraulic properties in MODFLOW‑6 simulations, eliminating manual input file handling.
